item.title: sendFrame help
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

im using Hippiescape V2 as my source
i want my spec bar to be “filled”…its empty with black letters
i want like

case ####: //Spec Bar if(specOff){ if(specialAmount > 0){ specOn true; if(specialAmount == 25){ sendFrame the filled bar with the colored letters
If you need the source,

moparisthebest.com
